cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sochi

sentence.kanji: 被災者を救うための特別な措置が取られました。
sentence.romaji: hisaisha wo sukuu tame no tokubetsu na sochi ga toraremashita
sentence.english: Special measures were taken to help the disaster vicitims.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oshimu

sentence.kanji: 私たちはみな彼の死を惜しんだの。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha mina kare no shi wo oshinda no
sentence.english: We all felt sorry about his death.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oshii

sentence.kanji: 惜しい、もう少しで優勝だった。
sentence.romaji: oshii mousukoshi de yuushou data
sentence.english: How close! We almost won.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's funka

sentence.kanji: 島で火山が噴火したよ。
sentence.romaji: shima de kazan ga funka shita yo
sentence.english: The volcano erupted on the island.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's funsui

sentence.kanji: 公園の噴水の前で会いましょう。
sentence.romaji: kouen no funsui no mae de aimashou
sentence.english: Let's meet in front of the fountain in the park.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's miwatasu

sentence.kanji: 丘の上から草原を見渡したの。
sentence.romaji: oka no ue kara sougen wo miwatashita no
sentence.english: I looked over the meadow from the top of the hill.
